## cleanUrlQueryString() function

Returns a URL with trailing `"?"` and `"&"` characters removed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cleanUrlQueryString: (url: string) => string
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

url


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

URL


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

## Example


```ts
cleanUrlQueryString("/foo?")
// "/foo"

cleanUrlQueryString("/foo?bar&")
// "/foo?bar"
```
